column4: slew:ntfs-3g installed ? no firewall on laptop? eneabled file n foldersharing on vista ?

thanks, i found that the firewall was turned on in vista and turned it off, went to places > network, found some network names in there but nothing worked, and also tried to browse directly to the vista ip addy but still nothing. >:(
from hardy-terminal, does a : sudo ping <nameOfTheVistaMachine> work ?
yes, i can ping her lappy by ping herpcname
whats the name of the vistapc and wheres the folder located you wanto to exchange with ?
make shure the folder public pictures has no blank in the name
if i remove the pictures part and just keep it //jessi-pc/users/public/public i should get access to all sub folders in that folder, correct?
its working. i restarted the linux box and was able to put the oh-so-precious wedding pictures on her laptop
